comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: The Honolulu star-bulletin., March 05, 1914, 3:30 Edition, Image 1 reported that Baron Matsuda, for the past several years minster of justice of Japan, died last night in Tokio. He was then Matsuda Masahisa, 1845 - 1914, see books.google.ch/books?id=bAIXZlNFinEC&pg=PA123&dq...

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: and this is probably a 1916 service in connection with this commemorative statue:

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: The link to the Japanese history book above does not display correctly for me, perhaps due to geographic rights, but this one does: books.google.com/books?id=bAIXZlNFinEC&q=matsuda#v=sn... see entry at p. 123. Baron Masahisa Matsuda's Japanese Wikipedia entry is at ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%9D%BE%E7%94%B0%E6%AD%A3%E4%B9%85
